title: Which subject to choose in jan term

posts.author: 21f3000745
posts.content:
Hii all…i know this may not be the correct platform to ask this question.

Actually i have 3 diploma subjects to cover - MLP, JAVA, TDS. So which 2 subject should i choose for this term?

posts.author: 22f3002293
posts.content: Don’t take TDS, this subject should be taken in the end else you might have some problem

posts.author: carlton
posts.content:
TDS at the end best. Gives you the best chance of doing well in it.


Kind regards

posts.author: Adityach1
posts.content: Yes you should do tds after mlp only it really help you alot trust me
